greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction expansion with iterated 3-fold symmetry.
link: H. Cohn, Symmetry and specializability in continued fractions
mathematica: nmax = 50; f[m_] := ContinuedFraction[ Sum[ 1/ChebyshevT[4^k, 2], {k, 0, m}]]; A089267 = Catch[ For[m = 1, True, m++, If[ Length[fm = f[m]] > nmax, Throw[ fm[[1 ;; nmax]] ]]]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 19 2012 *)
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Oct 30 2003
